data.eml:eml: Four new species of Hemicaecilius Enderlein (Lachesillidae: Psocoptera) from Valle del Cauca, Colombia

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article García, Alfonso N., Obando, Ranulfo González, Carrejo, Nancy S. (2012): Four new species of Hemicaecilius Enderlein (Lachesillidae: Psocoptera) from Valle del Cauca, Colombia. Zootaxa 3455: 49-60, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.282187
